subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] nuff said?
author: Lizzie Broden
full_text:
--0-810958713-1272078540=:37996
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You are ever bit as bad=C2=A0as Randi or any of them!=C2=A0 You are just th=
e flip-side of the coin!

Your misuse of the word,=C2=A0"Skeptic" has taken=
 on a totally new meaning.=C2=A0 You see anyone that has a problem with you=
r half baked ideas, and insanity, yeah I said it, as a "Skeptic."

Maybe it=
 would do you some good to research the word and idea behind it before you =
go off half cocked as you are.=C2=A0=C2=A0The world is not out to get you o=
r your damned box!=C2=A0 If there is any truth to it, the let's see the evi=
dence of it.=C2=A0 Lets look at it for what it is, NOT WHAT YOU OR ANYONE W=
ANTS IT TO BE!

What it is, no more and no less!

I am a Skeptic, it the tr=
ue sense of the word.=C2=A0 And I have been holding my tongue hoping you wo=
uld pull out of this crap.=C2=A0 Frank, get a grip!

Not everyone that disa=
grees with=C2=A0you is out to get you!=C2=A0 I have real problems with the =
whole theory, but I have never questioned your heart or=C2=A0integrity over=
 it.=C2=A0 (Well, other than letting Moon play the dance he is playing with=
 YOUR BOX!)

But, lets analytically look at this for what it is and find=C2=
=A0the truth of it?=C2=A0 If you want to turn it into a religion that is on=
 top of some mountain, so be it!=C2=A0 But other people are not going to se=
e the subject in black and white standards.

Give it a rest and thinks abou=
t it.=C2=A0 The world is not out to get you Frank!

=C2=A0"Nature is showin=
g us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs t=
o it even though, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itsel=
f all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 


"It is far better to grasp t=
he universe as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfyin=
g and reassuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignifica=
nt detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL 




____=
____________________________
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...=
m>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Fri, April 23, 2010 7:29:14 PM
Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] nuff said?

=C2=A0 
=C2=A0I=C2=A0know what it is, even thou=
gh I can't even spell it or pronounce it. It's what the skeptics and debunk=
ers tout as the answer to all paranormal experience. I think we ought to pu=
ll our claws back in, especially me!

=C2=A0I have gotten "voices" that I t=
hought were perfectly clear, and no one else could hear it, and some=C2=A0I=
 found=C2=A0was just=C2=A0a snippet of music, so yeah, that happens, but it=
 does not eliminate or explain everything from the boxes, and other EVP met=
hods, you=C2=A0 just have to be aware of the possibility. Anotherr problem =
is broadcast fragments, sometimes they are just what they sound like, an ad=
 for one thing or another, sometimes they can=C2=A0have sychronistic meanin=
g, and sometimes they can be altered in some way to form a messages, such a=
s the recent one I had about learning sex, which was seemingly ignored by a=
ll cuz it has the "s" word--I guess. The fragments can also be distorted as=
 the radio tuning is swept across a station, I don't accept every word and =
syllable as meaning something. You have tio judge mnessage by content and p=
ersonal meaning. 

=C2=A0I have seen faces stand up in a carpet right in fr=
ont of me, not something I just happened across, something that happened li=
ve as I watched. For someone to suggest that's imagination I find very offe=
nsive.=C2=A0 

=C2=A0When I first switched to a linear sweep in the boxes, =
I could hear nothing but gibberish, then suddenly=C2=A0I could hear "them"=
=C2=A0speaking. I doubt that is all imagination either, I think the mind(wh=
ich is not brain) has to reprogram the ears, which are brain, to hear.=C2=
=A0 I also think the skeptics can not allow this programming to take place,=
 hence they can't hear. I would be very surprised if any of the hard core s=
keptics even turned on a box for fear that they may hear something that's n=
ot there. Rorke(the Phd) implied as much when he wanted a box to test, or m=
ore=C2=A0like debunk. That crap is frikkin' pathetic!




F-S



=C2=A0
On =
Fri, Apr 23, 2010 at 4:30 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostres=
earch. com> wrote:

=C2=A0 
>Pareidolia is not psuedo science. It is an act=
ual, proven, natural functioning of the brain.
>
>http://en.wikipedia .org/=
wiki/ Pareidolia
>
>Please read this article, and more, if you have any que=
stions about it being psuedo science. I chose the Wikipedia version because=
 I thought it would be the least offensive to you. Other articles specifica=
lly called out EVP and other things.
>
>For the record, I don't think all E=
VP's are due to pareidolia. 
>
>
>
>
>On Fri, Apr 23, 2010 at 3:47 PM, Fran=
k Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:
>
>=C2=A0 
>>=C2=A0It was im=
plied that all this stuff is "Pareidolia", and because you could put a name=
 on it that somehow meant it was all explanined. I've been hearing this pse=
udo scientific BS for 10 years, so I'm a bit touchy. Science explains the p=
aranormal away, and yet people continune to photograph images, and get thei=
r names, and the names of deseased loved ones through EVP, as well as quest=
ions answered, and science(althogh not all scientists)=C2=A0just ignores th=
ese inconvinient facts and focuses on=C2=A0that we=C2=A0might see things th=
at are not there, which I disagree with as well. 
>>
>>=C2=A0Did you even b=
other looking at the image on the group home page. That was from sweeping a=
 TV tuner with a random voltage and video recording the monitor screen. So =
explain away why there is a wolf image embedded in the guy's hat, an image =
of an alien below his ear, and why in God's name does he resembles the clas=
sic description=C2=A0of an MIB or=C2=A0Shadow Person?=C2=A0 Pareidolia no d=
oubt!
>>
>>=C2=A0F-S
>>
